segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite fascinating how oblivious the woman is to the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on drying the plate is so intense, yet there's a flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, and I can't help but think about the mess that will ensue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like the serene garden outside is mocking the disorder inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit amused at the boy's daring attempt to reach for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he balances on that unstable stool makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t he realize how risky this is? One wrong move and he could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is so hopeful with her hand raised; she trusts him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know the trouble they could get into if the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
